member.name: T:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType
member.summary: Supported native dBASE column types.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Date
member.summary: 8 bytes - date stored as a string in the format YYYYMMDD.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.FoxProDateTime
member.summary: 8 bytes - the first 4 bytes represent days and the rest 4 bytes represent milliseconds.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Float
member.summary: Number stored as a string, right justified, and padded with blanks to the width of the field.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Char
member.summary: All OEM code page characters - padded with blanks to the width of the field.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Logical
member.summary: 1 byte - initialized to 0x20 (space) otherwise T or F

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Long
member.summary: 4 bytes. Leftmost bit used to indicate sign, 0 negative.

member.name: F:NDbfReader.NativeColumnType.Numeric
member.summary: Number stored as a string, right justified, and padded with blanks to the width of the field.

member.summary: Opens a reader of the table with the default UTF-8 encoding. Only one reader per table can be opened.
member.exception: Another reader of the table is opened.

member.exception: Another reader of the table is opened.

member.name: M:NDbfReader.Table.Disposing
member.summary:
Releases the underlying stream.
The method is called only when the method is called for the first time. You MUST always call the base implementation.

member.summary: Throws a if the table is already disposed.
